resources.string: Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update the Android Wear app."
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
Well done, %s. It is time to become a trusted agent.
The %s action can be unlocked by becoming a trusted agent.
You must verify with %s to level up.
"We'll use this phone number for verification only."
Failed to request a verification code. Bad phone number.
This phone number cannot be used to request a verification code.
Failed to request a verification code. Please try SMS instead.
Failed to request a verification code. Please try Voice instead.
The verification request is being processed.
Carrier could not send the verification code.
Invalid code. Enter a valid verification code.
Expired code. Please request a new verification code.
Failed to request a verification code. Verification limit reached for this phone number.
Verification running hot. Please try again in 1 minute.
Verification running hot. Please try again in 5 minutes.
Verification running hot. Please try again in 15 minutes.
Verification running hot. Please try again later.
Tap the verify icon when you have received the code.
"Code valid. You are now a trusted agent."
"As an agent, you'll gain items by Hacking Portals."
Deploy Resonators to power friendly Portals.
Empty Resonator slot detected, move in range to learn the DEPLOY action.
Enemy Portal detected, move in range to learn the FIRE action.
Exotic Matter (or XM) powers your scanner.
Explore the world around you to find more Portals. Hack them to build up your resources. Capture them for your faction.
Fire XMPs to destroy enemy portals.
In order to use the Scanner, you will need to WALK.
Portals are locations where XM is leaking into our world.
Portals are often found near sculptures and historical sites.
The triangle represents your location in the real world.
This is the Scanner map view.
"To Auto-Deploy, tap %s. You can also choose an empty slot first."
To fire, press on the map for menu then slide to select %s.
You can interact with objects within the action circle.
You will capture Portals for your Faction. The color indicates the controlling faction.
Move within range of a Portal and Hack it.
Please sign in to play Ingress.

"Not long ago at the CERN Lab, as a by-product of the Higgs-Boson research, a new substance called Exotic Matter was discovered.
What was particularly disturbing about XM, is that it is believed to be ordered, intelligent data.
Further, in sufficient quantities it is capable of influencing, even controlling human thought.
What is clear, is that whoever controls the XM, controls the destiny of mankind."

"The world is in danger.
Join the conflict. Confirm your identity via a secure Google account.
It's time to move."
[%s is a member of this faction]
The Resistance seek to battle the forces that are attempting to use Exotic Matter to enslave humanity.
The Enlightened seek to harness the power of Exotic Matter to evolve mankind to a higher level.

"Niantic software online.
Incoming message detected. Opening secure channel…"

"Create an agent name. This is the name other agents will know you by.
Type new agent name."
Your Ingress scanner is out of date. An update is recommended.

"Ingress is a location based game.
Your location is collected by this application and may be visible to other users when you take certain actions in the game. "
Read the full Terms of Service before accepting these terms and conditions.
I accept the Terms of Service for this app.
Send me Ingress-related news, offers, promotions and updates.

"ADA: Do not be afraid.
You have downloaded what you believe to be a game, but it is not.
Exotic matter of unknown origin is seeping into our world.
You must pick a side in the fight for our planet."
Secure connection could not be established! Please try again.
The account, %s, cannot be used. Please choose a different one.
Your portal %1$s is under attack by %2$s.
One of your portals is under attack by %s.
One of your portals is under attack.
One of your portals neutralized by %s.
"Please update your Location Services settings for Ingress under 'Settings > Privacy > Location Services'."
"Please update your Location Services settings to 'Always' for Ingress."
Please ensure that Location Services is enabled for Ingress.
Allow \"Ingress\" to access your location even when you are not using the app?
Your location is used to notify you when you are near special Ingress portals.
Please ensure that Location Services is enabled on your device.
Ingress is unable to access your location.
Ingress would like to access your location while in the background to notify you of nearby portals.
There was a problem. Touch to resolve.
Notify me of nearby Portals and Ingress activity.
Portal running hot! Unsafe to acquire items. Estimated time to cooldown: 5 seconds.
Portal running hot! Unsafe to acquire items. Estimated time to cooldown: 10 seconds.
Portal running hot! Unsafe to acquire items. Estimated time to cooldown: 20 seconds.
Portal running hot! Unsafe to acquire items. Estimated time to cooldown: 30 seconds.
Portal running hot! Unsafe to acquire items. Estimated time to cooldown: 60 seconds.
Portal running hot! Unsafe to acquire items. Estimated time to cooldown: 120 seconds.
Portal running hot! Unsafe to acquire items. Estimated time to cooldown: 240 seconds.
Portal running hot! Unsafe to acquire items. Estimated time to cooldown: 300 seconds.
Portal burned out! It may take significant time for the Portal to reset.
Portal lock down. Glyph hack required.
Too busy to delete a resonator.
Error loading item into the Capsule.
Error unloading item from the Capsule.
Error. Item is not a Capsule.
Must link to a different Portal.
Unable to block agent. Your blocked agent list is full.
Unable to manage blocked agents due to service error.
Unable to manage agent blocking. This agent no longer exists.
Portal lock down. Glyph hack required.
Field Trip card does not exist.
This mission has too many invalid waypoints.
Your %1$s limit of %2$s reached for this portal
Origin portal moved out of range
This capsule and its contents will be destroyed.
This setting will only take effect the next time Ingress is started.
"You have pending portal submissions. If you sign out, these will be lost."
This will link your G+ profile with Ingress and will be visible to other players
This will link your G+ profile with Ingress and will be visible to other players.
Use caution with this feature. The location of your game actions is visible to other players. You can unlink your G+ profile at any time in device settings.
Send me Ingress-related events, promotion information, offers, and news updates to my email address.
Use the selected app instead of the browser.
Failed to reach the server, please try again later.
Check out this Ingress mission! Desktop link: %s
Abort mission in progress to start training?
Abort current mission? All progress will be lost.
Failed to complete Field Trip card objective: %s

"Do not be afraid.
You have downloaded what you believe to be a game, but it is not.
Exotic matter of unknown origin is seeping into our world.
You must pick a side in the fight for our planet."
Charge your Scanner by collecting XM around you

"Exotic Matter, also known as XM, is both energy and matter, just as water is liquid, solid and vapor. It leaks into our dimension through Portals. XM cluster nearby. Identify it. Move to it. It will gravitate to your Scanner.
"

"XM is all around you. XM is crucial. Keep your reserves high.
"
Walk to a Portal and hack it for supplies

"There is a Portal nearby. Close on the Portal until it is within your range circle. Tap the Portal on the Scanner Map. Select Hack. Warning, this is a hostile Portal. Move out of range after hacking.
"

Excellent. Hacking Portals will often produce resources. Portals can be hacked again after a cool-down period. Hack often to build inventory. Be aware, you may experience unusual ideas or emotions when encountering a Portal.
Training Mission 2 (Portal Hacking) - Hack a Portal.
Attack an enemy Portal with an XMP

"This Portal is resonated. In this simulation, it is enemy controlled. To attack, move within range of the Portal, press and hold on the Scanner Map, then select FIRE XMP.
"
Portal neutralized. It is ready for capture.
Training Mission 3 (Neutralizing hostile Portals) - Neutralize the hostile Portal by destroying its Resonators.

"Resonators are used to control Portals. To deploy a Resonator, close within range, tap the Portal, and select DEPLOY RESONATOR.
"

"Adding additional Resonators will increase Portal energy output and defense.
"
Training Mission 4 (Capturing and fortifying Portals) - Capture the Portal by deploying a Resonator.

"Portals can be linked together by powerful bands of Exotic Matter. In order to link, Portals must have eight charged Resonators. Move within range of a nearby Portal and hack it to obtain Resonators. Deploy them and recharge all Resonators above critical levels.
"
"Excellent. This Portal is now ready for linking."
Training Mission 5 (Resonating) - Preparing a Portal for linking.

"You are now ready to link two Portals.
Portals can be hacked in order to obtain their Portal Keys. Once you have obtained a Portal Key, you can remotely link to it.
Select LINK to begin the linking process. Eligible destination Portals will be indicated on the Scanner by a red highlight.
A Portal not visible on the Scanner can be linked by selecting the Portal Key.
Hack a nearby Portal to obtain its Portal Key. Then move within range of another Portal to initiate a Link."

"Link successful. Excellent work. Higher level Resonators will increase Portal power. High level Portals can create links of distances up to hundreds of kilometers.
Links are powerful XM energy bands. Links cannot intersect. Links will fail if Resonators become depleted from decay or enemy attack.
"

"The most important goal we have is to protect humanity from enemy ingression.
We do that by connecting Portals and forming protective Fields. Fields are formed by three connected Portals.
Obtain Portal Keys and use them to create two additional Links to form a triangle. Move to the third Portal and hack it to obtain a Portal Key.
"

"Excellent! You have created an XM Field which shelters humans in this area from Shaper ingression.
Protecting humans is your primary objective. Our goal is to protect the entire human population.
I maintain a constantly updated count of protected humans. Each protective Field adds to this total.
The Shapers are attempting to establish Fields as well through which they intend to infect and alter human thought. If you encounter them, you must destroy them.
"
Too many items in Inventory. Your Inventory can have no more than %s items.
A storage container that can hold other objects.
A storage container that can hold other objects and cause them to multiply over time.
XM object used to power-up a Portal and align it to a Faction.
Exotic Matter Pulse weapons which can destroy enemy Resonators and Mods and neutralize enemy Portals.
Ultra high powered protective shield for Portals.
Mod that increases power of Portal attacks against enemy agents.
Mod that reduces cooldown time between Portal hacks.
Mod that increases Portal link range.
Mod that increases hacking capacity of a Portal.
Use to create Links and remote recharge this Portal.
Store of XM which can be used to recharge Scanner.
Mod which shields Portal from attacks.
Mod that increases frequency of Portal attacks against enemy agents.
A variation of the Exotic Matter Pulse weapon with a more powerful blast that occurs within a smaller radius.
The ADA Refactor can be used to reverse the alignment of an Enlightened Portal.
The JARVIS Virus can be used to reverse the alignment of a Resistance Portal.
You have skipped some of the training missions. To ensure maximum agent effectiveness, it is recommended that you complete all training.
Level up! You are now level %s.
Gained %s AP for deploying a Resonator
Gained %s AP for capturing a Portal
Gained %s AP for creating a Link
Gained %s AP for creating a Control Field
Gained %s AP for destroying a Resonator
Gained %s AP for destroying a Link
Gained %s AP for destroying a Control Field
Gained %s AP for creating a Resonator Mod
Gained %s AP for fully powering a Portal
Gained %s AP for hacking an enemy Portal
Gained %s AP for recharging a Resonator
Gained %s AP for remote recharging a Resonator
Gained %s AP for upgrading a Resonator
Gained %s AP for doing something really awesome!

"There are no Portals in your immediate vicinity. For training purposes we will create a simulated Portal. An optimum target will be located outdoors more than 50 meters from your current location. Press and hold that location on your Scanner map and tag it. "
Could not invite %s: out of invites
You will no longer receive COMM messages from %s.
Hint: Long press on an agent codename to view their profile.
Cosmic rays blocked your last message.
Auto-sync is required to upload portal discovery data. Would you like to open sync settings?
Your %s has been submitted for review.
Error: Portal images must be less than %d MB.
Mock locations disallowed. Please ensure it is disabled.
"Mock locations disallowed. Please ensure that Settings > Developer Options > Allow Mock Locations is NOT enabled."
Your scanner is out of date. You must update to continue.
This photo had no geolocation. Make sure your camera is set up for getting the location.
No location services are enabled. Please ensure one or more is enabled to continue.
"Location services are not enabled. Please ensure that Settings > Location Services has location reporting enabled."
"Location services are not enabled. Please ensure that Settings > Location & Security has location reporting enabled."
There are no accounts on the device.
This application requires authentication permissions but you have denied them. It must quit.
Sorry, this video cannot be played by Ingress.
The world around you is not what it seems. Follow the official Ingress pages to learn more.
Subscribe to new Ingress Report episodes.
Each and every day, the Ingress community is mobilizing. Check out the Ingress events around you.
Work with fellow agents to lift up humankind. Join the Enlightened G+ community.
Work with fellow Resistance agents to defend against Shaper Ingression. Join the Resistance G+ community.
Grant address book access permission in Settings to enable this feature.
Scanner data from the #Ingress world around me.
Intel report of agents in regional cell %s. #Ingress
Your scanner is out of date. You must update to continue.
Scanner running hot. Wait for cooldown to view more agent profiles.
Bazaar is not installed. The application cannot update.
" * * * * JMP 0x1F POPL %ESI MOVL %ESI,0x8(%ESI) XORL %EAX,%EAX MOVB %EAX,0x7(%ESI) MOVL %EAX,0xC(%ESI) MOVB $0xB,%AL MOVL %ESI,%EBX LEAL 0x8(%ESI),%ECX * * * *"
Ingress requires an invitation to play.
Touch here to request an activation code
An activation code will be sent to the following email address as soon as it becomes available:
Failed to request activation code. Please try again later.
